name: Young Flame Dragon
languages: Common, Draconic, Ignan, Giant, Infernal, Orc

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes one bite attack and two claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area takes 56 (16d6) fire damage, or half damage with a successful DC 16 Dexterity saving throw.

special_abilities.name: Fire Incarnate
special_abilities.desc: All fire damage dealt by the dragon ignores fire resistance but not fire immunity.
